abi: function mint(address to, uint256 amount) public
function approve(address spender, uint256 amount) public returns (bool)
function allowance(address owner, address spender) public view returns (uint256)
function balanceOf(address account) public view returns (uint256)
function transfer(address to, uint256 value) public returns (bool)
function initiate(address _token, address _receiver, uint256 _amount) payable returns (bytes32)
function activeTransfers(bytes32) external view returns (address sender, address receiver, address token, uint256 amount, uint256 createdAt, uint256 expiresAt)
event TransferInitiated(bytes32 indexed id, address indexed sender, address indexed receiver, uint256 amount)
event TransferSettled(bytes32 indexed id, string action)
